### Unchanged (Intentional)

- `SVG_PLAYER_VERSION_MAJOR/MINOR/PATCH` - External constants from `version.h`
- `SVGSizeInfo`, `SVGDualPoint`, `SVGRect`, `SVGDebugFlags` - Defined in `SVGTypes.h`
- `SVGPlaybackState`, `SVGRepeatMode`, `SVGRenderStats` - Defined in `SVGTypes.h`
- Callback typedefs (`SVGStateChangeCallback`, etc.) - Use generic `SVG` prefix, not `SVGPlayer_`
